description: [SilverTerrier](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0083) targets organizations in high technology, higher education, and manufacturing for business email compromise (BEC) campaigns with the goal of financial theft.(Citation: Unit42 SilverTerrier 2018)(Citation: Unit42 SilverTerrier 2016)

external_references.description: Renals, P., Conant, S. (2016). SILVERTERRIER: The Next Evolution in Nigerian Cybercrime. Retrieved November 13, 2018.
Unit42. (2016). SILVERTERRIER: THE RISE OF NIGERIAN BUSINESS EMAIL COMPROMISE. Retrieved November 13, 2018.
